step.context: \textbf{Check Point } \#1: \text{ Is the function defined} \\ \text{and continuous in } [1, 2] ?
step.tex: \text{Yes. } (4x^3 -5x^2 +6x +9) \text{ is defined and is}\\ \text{continuous in } [1, 2] \text{, being a polynomial function.}
step.reason: \int^{b}_{a}f(x)\, dx \text{ makes sense only if f(x) is} \\ \text{defined and is continuous in [a, b].} \\ \text{ For example, }\int^{1}_{-1} \dfrac{1}{x} \, dx \text{ is not defined}\\ \text{because }\dfrac{1}{x} \text{ is discontinuos at } x = 0 \in [-1, 1]
